item.title: Mano add a quote by Brady Udall
item.description: "If I could tell you only one thing about my life it would be this: when I was seven years old the mailman ran over my had. As formative events go, nothing else comes close; my careening, zigzag existence, my wounded brain and faith in God, my collisions with joy and affliction, all of it has come, in one way or another, out of that moment on a summer morning when the left rear tire of a United States postal jeep ground my tiny head into the hot gravel of the San Carlos Apache Indian reservation." -- Brady Udall

item.title: Mano add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Stop leaving and you will arrive. Stop searching and you will see. Stop running away and you will be found." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Mano add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "What you seek is seeking you." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "The wound is the place where the Light enters you." -- Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Donâ€™t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form." -- Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free." -- Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "When I am with you, we stay up all night. When you're not here, I can't go to sleep. Praise God for those two insomnias! And the difference between them." -- Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Forget safety. Live where you fear to live. Destroy your reputation. Be notorious." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Let the beauty we love be what we do. There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground." -- Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Do not feel lonely, the entire universe is inside you." -- Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description:
"I want to see you.
Know your voice.
Recognize you when you first come 'round the corner.
Sense your scent when I come into a room you've just left.
Know the lift of your heel, the glide of your foot.
Become familiar with the way you purse your lips then let them part, just the slightest bit, when I lean in to your space and kiss you.
I want to know the joy of how you whisper "more" -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Sit, be still, and listen, because you're drunk and we're at the edge of the roof." -- Rumi

item.title: Mano add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description:
"Be empty of worrying. Think of who created thought!
Why do you stay in prison When the door is so wide open?" -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
